content: I noticed that some people raise concrete technical questions in their answers to the survey, and they have email recorded, and willing to be contacted. Is it appropriate to send email to them directly to answer their questions?
Good question :) like, just a personal response ?
I don't think you should feel obligated to do so but I also don't see the harm. I'm debating who else to ask to get a broader opinion.
Any memory @Manish Goregaokar if we did this in the past?
